name: Simetrik
headline: No code enterprise SaaS for financial control automation.
description: No code enterprise SaaS for financial control automation. Empowering finops and accounting teams with a no code platform that allows them to automate and maintain financial control automation throughout the finops process.

# Simplify and Automate your Company's Financial Control
Our AI-powered solution automates reconciliation and accounting closure controls, increasing financial efficiency and reducing operational effort.
[Request a Demo](https://simetrik.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/678ee3f8299ec0c9bbdf3222_home-website.png)
world class companies already TRUST us

0b6e_movii.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b16_6-Banesco.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b17_2-madeira_madeira.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b18_23-RappyPay.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b31_27-Kushki%20RGB.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b30_26-PedidosYa.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b32_15-neon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b33_9-credibando.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b34_52-puntored.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b35_11-recargapay.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b36_30-Uala.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b37_51-aspire.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b45_48-easebuzz.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b39_57-RAZORPAY.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b3a_49-getnet.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b3b_54-spin-logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b3c_56-banco-daycoval.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b3d_35-Loggi-Logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b3e_45-Prisma.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b3f_55-maistodos.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b41_38-Prex-logo.svg)
WHY US
## Optimize Tasks for Operational, Financial, and Accounting Teams
We simplify management, control, and monitoring on a single No Code platform, enhance by Building Blocks, that automates financial operations.
[How We Do It](https://simetrik.com/<#how>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788043031f7add72f7a25e5_icon01.png)
### Everything in One Place
We simplify reconciliation control, result visualization, data export, and accounting closure automatically.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67880440b4df8a121e58b42b_icon02.png)
### Custom Solution
We configure financial controls for various use cases, positioning us as an essential tool for businesses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788044bba1edcb9a5e99b0d_icon03.png)
### Smart Assistant
We developed Simetrik Assistant with AI to configure controls and generate detailed reports to analyze data automatically.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788046397c96f687eea4d27_icon04.png)
### Accurate and Up-to-Date Data
We enable businesses to create dashboards and monitors for real-time reconciliation tracking.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788046e70c80f8dc8add8f2_icon05.png)
### Accelerated Onboarding
We optimize implementation time by up to 60% through replicable and adaptable templates for similar controls.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67880476a6256a533a92fd6e_icon06.png)
### Risk Mitigation
We reduce fraud, errors, and financial leaks that could lead to massive losses and inaccurate reports.
HOw WE DO IT
## Configure Each Financial Control Through Our Simetrik Building Blocks (SBBs)
Our +120 flexible and independent functionalities adapt to the specific needs of each company, allowing the configuration of operational and financial controls.
[Our Use Cases](https://simetrik.com/<#use>)
### Integrations
Automates data input and output, enhancing the flow of information.
### Universal Reconciliator
Automates large volumes of data, reducing manual work and the risk of errors.
### Data Analysis
Centralizes, summarizes and analyzes results in one place, simplifying decision-making.
### Accounting Translator
Connect the results of the controls automatically with your ERP.
### Close Management
Manages all accounting closing tasks in one place.
### Simetrik Assistant
Optimizes experience in the platform by integrating advanced GenAI technology.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/678803b0a3c94c8202560620_sbbs.png)
## Explore the Impact
+1B 
Reconciled records per day.
+4,800 
Automated connection sources.
+40 
Countries trust our solution.
5x
Annual growth in reconciled records.
10,6M
Files processed last year.
+85 TB
Processed last year.
USE CASES
## Minimize Risks and Maximize Operational Efficiency
We reduce fraud, errors, and leaks, mitigating financial, reputational, and legal risks through customized solutions that ensure accuracy for each use case.
Achieving Results
### Money In & Money Out
Ensure operational and financial control of cash inflows and outflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67880231f4f212306052586f_money_in.png)
Innovative Strategies
### Accounting Control
Record accurate transaction information in the system.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788024431f7add72f786ed8_accounting.png)
BENEFITS
## Discover Our Potential
Easy to use, yet robust and versatile enough to meet the complex needs of your business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c2ea45334ce691a0bfc_features01.png)
### Connect and Extract Financial Data
Integrate +4,800 sources in one single platform, empowering your team to automate their reconciliation processes quickly and easily.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c6083b640797caa9f22_features04.png)
### Control Alarms
Notify users of inconsistencies and anomalies quickly, ensuring timely issue resolution and maintaining high data accuracy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c53aff4d42d6e9fc63b_features03.png)
### Monitor with Dashboards
Offers an interactive, customizable view of metrics for efficient monitoring, detailed analysis, and decision-making.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c3eb0b8d5e113fc7574_features02.png)
### Produce Tangible Outputs
Access all information when needed, conveniently organized and easily accessible on a single, unified platform for optimal efficiency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c7eca9f7719266c3181_features05.png)
### Generate AI Report
Simetrik Assistant automates complex data analysis and creates actionable reports, streamlining the entire process significantly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c8a83eda3e48ca000a9_features06.png)
### Journal Entries Directly to the ERP
Reduce manual efforts and enhance accuracy, ensuring financial data is updated in real-time for better analysis and decision-making.
INDUSTRIES
## We Create Significant Value Across Different Industries
We meet the unique demands of industries with high transaction volumes, exposed to risks and fraud, and requiring rapid innovation in financial control.
[Check Testimonials](https://simetrik.com/<#testimonials>)
### Payment Service Providers
Controls the Value at Risk and ensures accurate dispersals to merchants across multiple methods.
### Banks & FI's
Centralizes accounting and operational controls on a single, easy-to-audit platform.
### Acquirers & Processors
Controls all incoming and outgoing processes, managing transaction fees and chargebacks.
### Retail & E-commerce
Automates accounts receivable and accounts payable for better financial performance.
### Marketplaces
Eliminates discrepancies and reduces financial errors, improving operations for sellers and buyers.
### Neobanks & Digital Wallets
Handles large transaction volumes and reduces risk of discrepancies among different balances.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67880258d49fdeb07461e749_industrias.png)
Testimonials
## Why Our Clients Trust Us
We optimize financial management, enabling businesses to focus on strategic growth and decision-making.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380aff_44-payu-logo-without-bg.svg)
‚ÄúSimetrik has been a strategic partner for controlling all our Money In across Latam. With this, we've moved away from our internal development and can now have detailed insights into our entire Transactional and Banking operation.‚Äù
Diana Carolina Artunduaga
Transactional and Reconciliation Manager, LATAM
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380afc_25-Rappi.svg)
‚ÄúThanks to Simetrik, we have improved the efficiency of blocking fraudulent users. Now we are better at preventing fraud and identifying it. Simetrik allowed us to change the focus of our financial team: it is no longer about finding shortages, but analyzing all that information that helps us centralize Simetrik to be more strategic.‚Äù
Edgar Felipe Pulido
M√°nager de pagos, Rappi
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b36_30-Uala.svg)
‚ÄúSimetrik is a product that makes our life easier. Thanks for give us such a reliable product and generate that love for operative reliability.‚Äù
Javier Covey
Operations Head, Ulal√°
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b03_10_Bancoagricola.svg)
‚ÄúSimetrik has become a management tool that helps us to visualize our accounting processes more quickly and accurately, and has aided us in decision-making and raising alerts in real-time.‚Äù
M√≥nica Rubio
Process Architecture Management, Bancoagr√≠cola
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b6d_logo-cobre-white.svg)
‚ÄúSimetrik has transformed the way we work within the team at Cobre by automating the sources for reconciliations through integrations. This allows us to analyze differences more efficiently and generate corrective actions to address underlying causes, increasing the reconciliation percentage. Our focus now is on analysis rather than operational tasks, enabling us to make more informed and strategic decisions.‚Äù
Diego Ruiz
Ops Strategy Manager, Cobre
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6760b3a4bd86ea46c9380b6e_movii.svg)
‚ÄúIn more than 26 years of professional life, I have worked with transactional conciliation processes. After leading multiple in-house projects and evaluating various products on the market, I was surprised that many important entities still rely on Excel for these critical processes. I can confidently say that Simetrik is the best option available on the market.‚Äù
Santiago Asmuss
COO, Movii and MoviiRed

WHY US
## Optimize Tasks for Operational, Financial, and Accounting Teams
We simplify management, control, and monitoring on a single No Code platform, enhance by Building Blocks, that automates financial operations.
How We Do It‚ü®3‚ü©
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788043031f7add72f7a25e5_icon01.png)
### Everything in One Place
We simplify reconciliation control, result visualization, data export, and accounting closure automatically.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67880440b4df8a121e58b42b_icon02.png)
### Custom Solution
We configure financial controls for various use cases, positioning us as an essential tool for businesses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788044bba1edcb9a5e99b0d_icon03.png)
### Smart Assistant
We developed Simetrik Assistant with AI to configure controls and generate detailed reports to analyze data automatically.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788046397c96f687eea4d27_icon04.png)
### Accurate and Up-to-Date Data
We enable businesses to create dashboards and monitors for real-time reconciliation tracking.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/6788046e70c80f8dc8add8f2_icon05.png)
### Accelerated Onboarding
We optimize implementation time by up to 60% through replicable and adaptable templates for similar controls.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67880476a6256a533a92fd6e_icon06.png)
### Risk Mitigation
We reduce fraud, errors, and financial leaks that could lead to massive losses and inaccurate reports.
HOw WE DO IT
## Configure Each Financial Control Through Our Simetrik Building Blocks (SBBs)
Our +120 flexible and independent functionalities adapt to the specific needs of each company, allowing the configuration of operational and financial controls.
Our Use Cases‚ü®4‚ü©
### Integrations

Manages all accounting closing tasks in one place.

## Discover Our Potential
Easy to use, yet robust and versatile enough to meet the complex needs of your business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c2ea45334ce691a0bfc_features01.png)
### Connect and Extract Financial Data
Integrate +4,800 sources in one single platform, empowering your team to automate their reconciliation processes quickly and easily.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c6083b640797caa9f22_features04.png)

Notify users of inconsistencies and anomalies quickly, ensuring timely issue resolution and maintaining high data accuracy.

### Monitor with Dashboards
Offers an interactive, customizable view of metrics for efficient monitoring, detailed analysis, and decision-making.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67881c3eb0b8d5e113fc7574_features02.png)

### Journal Entries Directly to the ERP
Reduce manual efforts and enhance accuracy, ensuring financial data is updated in real-time for better analysis and decision-making.
INDUSTRIES
## We Create Significant Value Across Different Industries
We meet the unique demands of industries with high transaction volumes, exposed to risks and fraud, and requiring rapid innovation in financial control.
Check Testimonials‚ü®7‚ü©
### Payment Service Providers
Controls the Value at Risk and ensures accurate dispersals to merchants across multiple methods.
### Banks & FI's
Centralizes accounting and operational controls on a single, easy-to-audit platform.
### Acquirers & Processors
Controls all incoming and outgoing processes, managing transaction fees and chargebacks.
### Retail & E-commerce
Automates accounts receivable and accounts payable for better financial performance.
### Marketplaces
Eliminates discrepancies and reduces financial errors, improving operations for sellers and buyers.
### Neobanks & Digital Wallets
Handles large transaction volumes and reduces risk of discrepancies among different balances.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6760b3a4bd86ea46c93808b3/67880258d49fdeb07461e749_industrias.png)

generated_description:
**Simetrik: Simplifying Financial Control Automation**

Simetrik is a Colombian fintech startup that was founded in 2018 and is part of the Y Combinator W18 batch. Based in Bogot√°, it has grown to a robust team of 350 employees, harnessing the power of a no-code enterprise SaaS platform specializing in financial control automation. Their mission is clear: to empower financial operations and accounting teams by automating processes, reducing operational burdens, and maintaining stringent financial controls at every stage of finance operations. 

**Why Simetrik?**

In today‚Äôs fast-paced financial landscape, accuracy and efficiency are critical. Simetrik brings a powerful solution that allows users to automate cumbersome reconciliation and accounting closure tasks. This not only boosts financial efficiency but also allows teams to focus on strategic decision-making instead of getting bogged down in manual processes.

With an impressive rollout of features that include customizable solutions tailored to unique business needs, real-time data dashboards, and AI-backed reporting tools, it's about making financial control simpler and smarter. Their Simetrik Assistant leverages advanced technology to refine operations and automate reporting tasks. Furthermore, with over 4,800 connection sources already integrated, they are positioned to serve a variety of industries, from payment service providers to e-commerce platforms.

**Proven Impact**

The platform stands out for its remarkable statistics ‚Äî processing over 1 billion reconciled records daily and experiencing five-fold growth in reconciled records year-on-year. Many prestigious companies like Bancolombia, MercadoLibre, and Rappi rely on Simetrik to enhance their financial processes. Testimonials from clients highlight how the platform has transformed their operations by reducing fraud and errors, providing more accurate insights, and enhancing overall financial performance.

**Conclusion**

In essence, Simetrik is creating a shift in how financial teams operate, removing the burden of tedious administrative tasks. Their approach of combining no-code technology with robust automation capabilities not only simplifies financial control but also sets a new standard in the fintech landscape. For anyone looking to streamline their financial operations without the hassle of coding or extensive tech knowledge, Simetrik seems to be a compelling option. To explore their offerings, you can check out their [website](https://simetrik.com) or request a demo to see it in action.
